main_pages.title: SERVICES
main_pages.description: Emergency food assistance by referral only (call 211)

main_pages.title: SERVICES
main_pages.description: By referral only, call 211 to get started. Operates as a drive-thru. Emergency Food Pantry: 3-day supply of food. Mountain of Food: Fresh produce, meats. Also a supplier of the Commodity Supplemental Food Program (call to register) for Summit County residents aged 60+ who qualify.

content_items.item_description: By referral only, call 211 to get started. Operates as a drive-thru. Emergency Food Pantry: 3-day supply of food. Mountain of Food: Fresh produce, meats. main_pages.title: SERVICES
main_pages.description: Food pantry.  Delivery available for those with transportation barriers as part of their Matthew 8:20/grocery delivery program.
